name: Free Pascal 1.0.x Compiled Object
summary: Learn about .OW files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Free Pascal is an open-source Pascal compiler that developers use to compile Pascal and Object Pascal source code into executable programs. In the past, Free Pascal saved object files created during the compilation process as OW files. Later versions of Free Pascal save object files as O files.

description: An OW file is a compiled object file created by version 1.0.x of Free Pascal, a Pascal compiler. It contains source code that has been compiled as part of creating an executable program. After creating OW files from a program's source code, Free Pascal links them together to create an executable.

instructions: OW files are not meant to be opened. Version 1.0.x of Free Pascal creates, references, and uses OW files during the program compilation process.
